The BlitzMax 5000 is the ultimate blending powerhouse from Blendify. It combines high performance with a sleek design, making it ideal for smoothies, soups, and more.

  • Container Capacity: 48 Oz.

  • Self-Detect Technology: Yes
  • Dishwasher Safe: Yes
  • Dimensions: 9.75 x 7.75 x 17 in.
  • HP: 2.2 HP - peak
